DEPT_CD = #dept_cd#
UNION ALL

FROM TBL_DSFT_ACPN_PROC A
LEFT JOIN TBL_HC_HIST C ON A.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO = C.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CRPN_CUST_BASE D ON A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USR B ON A.DSPSR_ID = B.USR_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_DEPT_CD G ON A.DSPSR_CHRG_DEPT = G.DEPT_CDNM LEFT JOIN TBL_SAP_CD H ON (A.ORGN_ENTR_DV_CD = H.CD_ID AND H.CD_CLAS_CD = '1') LEFT JOIN TBL_DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD I ON A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = I.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD
WHERE G.HGRK_DEPT_CD IN ('E00054','E00056','T21000','E00053','E00042','E00044','JD1000','E00048') AND A.PROC_DTM IS NOT NULL AND (A.DEL_YN = 'N' OR A.DEL_YN IS NULL)
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0332000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0400000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '0932000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '1000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '00000000' and #time_key# || '32000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '000000' and #time_key# || '240000'
AND A.DSFT_TYP_CD IN ('CA','CK')
A.DSFT_TYP_CD = #dsft_typ_cd#
A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = #dsft_taxn_typ_cd#
A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = #orgn_ptr_st_cd#
A.CONN_CHNL_KIND_CD = #conn_chnl_kind_cd#
G.HGRK_DEPT_CD = #hgrk_dept_cd#
G.DEPT_CD = #dept_cd#
B.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #dspsr_id_nm# ||'%'
AND A.HC_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.HC_YN = 'N' OR A.HC_YN IS NULL)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.ATTD_SFT_CD = #attd_sft_cd#)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.RSLT_SFT_CD = #rslt_sft_cd#)
A.HC_UABL_RSN_CD = #hc_uabl_rsn_cd#
A.PRDCT_CD = #prdct_cd#
A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD = #prblm_penom_cd#
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_CUST IS NOT NULL
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_PTR_ST IS NOT NULL
A.VHCL_BIZTR_QLIT_DSFT_TYP_CD = #vhcl_biztr_qlit_dsft_typ_cd#
AND A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'N' OR A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN IS NULL)
AND A.RWRD_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.RWRD_YN = 'N' OR A.RWRD_YN IS NULL)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.CO_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.TOT_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y'
AND A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
GROUP BY G.HGRK_DEPT_CDNM,G.HGRK_DEPT_CD, G.DEPT_CD,G.DEPT_CDNM
UNION ALL

ELSE 0 END) AS DATA22_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN I.DSFT_TYP_CD='DD' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DATA22_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN I.DSFT_TYP_CD='DE' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS DATA23_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN I.DSFT_TYP_CD='DE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DATA23_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN I.DSFT_TYP_CD='DF' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS DATA24_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN I.DSFT_TYP_CD='DF' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FROM TBL_DSFT_ACPN_PROC A
LEFT JOIN TBL_HC_HIST C ON A.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO = C.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CRPN_CUST_BASE D ON A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USR B ON A.DSPSR_ID = B.USR_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_DEPT_CD G ON A.DSPSR_CHRG_DEPT = G.DEPT_CDNM LEFT JOIN TBL_SAP_CD H ON (A.ORGN_ENTR_DV_CD = H.CD_ID AND H.CD_CLAS_CD = '1') LEFT JOIN TBL_DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD I ON A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = I.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD
WHERE (G.HGRK_DEPT_CD IS NULL OR G.HGRK_DEPT_CD NOT IN ('E00054','E00056','T21000','E00053','E00042','E00044','JD1000','E00048')) AND A.PROC_DTM IS NOT NULL AND (A.DEL_YN = 'N' OR A.DEL_YN IS NULL)

and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '00000000' and #time_key# || '32000000'

SELECT NVL(A.DSPSR_CHRG_DEPT,'') AS DSPSR_CHRG_DEPT ,A.Data1 AS DATA1 ,A.Data2 AS DATA2 ,A.Data3 AS DATA3 ,A.Data4 AS DATA4 ,A.Data5 AS DATA5 ,A.Data6 AS DATA6 ,A.Data7 AS DATA7 ,A.Data8 AS DATA8 ,A.Data9 AS DATA9 ,A.Data10 AS DATA10 ,A.Data11 AS DATA11 ,A.Data12 AS DATA12 ,A.Data1 + A.Data2 + A.Data3 + A.Data4 + A.Data5 + A.Data6 + A.Data7 + A.Data8 + A.Data9 + A.Data10 + A.Data11 + A.Data12 AS TOT_DATA FROM (select A.DSPSR_CHRG_DEPT as DSPSR_CHRG_DEPT ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) > 0 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 10000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 10000 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 20000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 20000 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 30000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 30000 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 40000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 40000 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 50000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 50000 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 60000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 60000 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 70000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 70000 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 80000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 80000 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 90000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 90000 AND NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) < 100000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) >= 100000 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Data12

FROM TBL_DSFT_ACPN_PROC A LEFT JOIN TBL_HC_HIST C ON A.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO = C.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CRPN_CUST_BASE D ON A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USR B ON A.DSPSR_ID = B.USR_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_EMP_CD F ON A.DSPSR_ID = F.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_DEPT_CD G ON F.BLNG_DEPT_CD = G.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_SAP_CD H ON (A.ORGN_ENTR_DV_CD = H.CD_ID AND H.CD_CLAS_CD = '1') LEFT JOIN TBL_DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD I ON A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = I.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD
WHERE G.HGRK_DEPT_CD IN ('E00054','E00056','T21000','E00053','E00042','E00044','JD1000','E00048') AND A.PROC_DTM IS NOT NULL AND (A.DEL_YN = 'N' OR A.DEL_YN IS NULL)
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0332000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0400000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '0932000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '1000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '00000000' and #time_key# || '32000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '000000' and #time_key# || '240000'
AND A.DSFT_TYP_CD IN ('CA','CK')
A.DSFT_TYP_CD = #dsft_typ_cd#
A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = #dsft_taxn_typ_cd#
A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = #orgn_ptr_st_cd#
A.CONN_CHNL_KIND_CD = #conn_chnl_kind_cd#
G.HGRK_DEPT_CD = #hgrk_dept_cd#
G.DEPT_CD = #dept_cd#
(B.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #dspsr_id_nm# ||'%' OR F.EMP_NM LIKE '%'|| #dspsr_id_nm# ||'%')
AND A.HC_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.HC_YN = 'N' OR A.HC_YN IS NULL)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.ATTD_SFT_CD = #attd_sft_cd#)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.RSLT_SFT_CD = #rslt_sft_cd#)
A.HC_UABL_RSN_CD = #hc_uabl_rsn_cd#
A.PRDCT_CD = #prdct_cd#
A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD = #prblm_penom_cd#
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_CUST IS NOT NULL
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_PTR_ST IS NOT NULL
A.VHCL_BIZTR_QLIT_DSFT_TYP_CD = #vhcl_biztr_qlit_dsft_typ_cd#
AND A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'N' OR A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN IS NULL)
AND A.RWRD_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.RWRD_YN = 'N' OR A.RWRD_YN IS NULL)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.CO_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.TOT_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y'
AND A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
GROUP BY G.HGRK_DEPT_CDNM,G.HGRK_DEPT_CD, G.DEPT_CD,G.DEPT_CDNM
UNION ALL

FROM TBL_DSFT_ACPN_PROC A LEFT JOIN TBL_HC_HIST C ON A.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO = C.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CRPN_CUST_BASE D ON A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USR B ON A.DSPSR_ID = B.USR_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_EMP_CD F ON A.DSPSR_ID = F.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_DEPT_CD G ON F.BLNG_DEPT_CD = G.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_SAP_CD H ON (A.ORGN_ENTR_DV_CD = H.CD_ID AND H.CD_CLAS_CD = '1') LEFT JOIN TBL_DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD I ON A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = I.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD
WHERE (G.HGRK_DEPT_CD IS NULL OR G.HGRK_DEPT_CD NOT IN ('E00054','E00056','T21000','E00053','E00042','E00044','JD1000','E00048')) AND A.PROC_DTM IS NOT NULL AND (A.DEL_YN = 'N' OR A.DEL_YN IS NULL)
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0332000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0400000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '0932000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '1000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '00000000' and #time_key# || '32000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '000000' and #time_key# || '240000'
AND A.DSFT_TYP_CD IN ('CA','CK')
A.DSFT_TYP_CD = #dsft_typ_cd#
A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = #dsft_taxn_typ_cd#
A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = #orgn_ptr_st_cd#
A.CONN_CHNL_KIND_CD = #conn_chnl_kind_cd#
G.HGRK_DEPT_CD = #hgrk_dept_cd#
G.DEPT_CD = #dept_cd#
(B.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #dspsr_id_nm# ||'%' OR F.EMP_NM LIKE '%'|| #dspsr_id_nm# ||'%')
AND A.HC_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.HC_YN = 'N' OR A.HC_YN IS NULL)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.ATTD_SFT_CD = #attd_sft_cd#)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.RSLT_SFT_CD = #rslt_sft_cd#)
A.HC_UABL_RSN_CD = #hc_uabl_rsn_cd#
A.PRDCT_CD = #prdct_cd#
A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD = #prblm_penom_cd#
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_CUST IS NOT NULL
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_PTR_ST IS NOT NULL
A.VHCL_BIZTR_QLIT_DSFT_TYP_CD = #vhcl_biztr_qlit_dsft_typ_cd#
AND A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'N' OR A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN IS NULL)
AND A.RWRD_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.RWRD_YN = 'N' OR A.RWRD_YN IS NULL)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.CO_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.TOT_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y'
AND A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
) Q2
ON Q1.DEPT_CD = Q2.DEPT_CD
GROUP BY ROLLUP(Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CD,Q1.DEPT_CD) ORDER BY Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CD, MAX(Q1.DEPT_CDNM), Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CD,Q1.DEPT_CD

SELECT Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CD AS HGRK_DEPT_CD ,CASE WHEN Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CD IS NULL THEN '전체' ELSE MAX(Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CDNM) END AS HGRK_DEPT_CDNM ,Q1.DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD ,CASE WHEN Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CD IS NULL THEN '평균' WHEN Q1.DEPT_CD IS NULL THEN '소계' ELSE MAX(Q1.DEPT_CDNM) END AS DSPSR_CHRG_DEPT

FROM TBL_DSFT_ACPN_PROC A LEFT JOIN TBL_HC_HIST C ON A.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO = C.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CRPN_CUST_BASE D ON A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USR B ON A.DSPSR_ID = B.USR_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_EMP_CD F ON A.DSPSR_ID = F.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_DEPT_CD G ON F.BLNG_DEPT_CD = G.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_SAP_CD H ON (A.ORGN_ENTR_DV_CD = H.CD_ID AND H.CD_CLAS_CD = '1') LEFT JOIN TBL_DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD I ON A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = I.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD
WHERE G.HGRK_DEPT_CD IN ('E00054','E00056','T21000','E00053','E00042','E00044','JD1000','E00048') AND A.PROC_DTM IS NOT NULL AND (A.DEL_YN = 'N' OR A.DEL_YN IS NULL) AND A.DSFT_TYP_CD IN ('CA','CK')
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0332000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0400000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '0932000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '1000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '00000000' and #time_key# || '32000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '000000' and #time_key# || '240000'
A.DSFT_TYP_CD = #dsft_typ_cd#
A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = #dsft_taxn_typ_cd#
A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = #orgn_ptr_st_cd#
A.CONN_CHNL_KIND_CD = #conn_chnl_kind_cd#
G.HGRK_DEPT_CD = #hgrk_dept_cd#
G.DEPT_CD = #dept_cd#
(B.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #dspsr_id_nm# ||'%' OR F.EMP_NM LIKE '%'|| #dspsr_id_nm# ||'%')
AND A.HC_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.HC_YN = 'N' OR A.HC_YN IS NULL)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.ATTD_SFT_CD = #attd_sft_cd#)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.RSLT_SFT_CD = #rslt_sft_cd#)
A.HC_UABL_RSN_CD = #hc_uabl_rsn_cd#
A.PRDCT_CD = #prdct_cd#
A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD = #prblm_penom_cd#
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_CUST IS NOT NULL
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_PTR_ST IS NOT NULL
A.VHCL_BIZTR_QLIT_DSFT_TYP_CD = #vhcl_biztr_qlit_dsft_typ_cd#
AND A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'N' OR A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN IS NULL)
AND A.RWRD_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.RWRD_YN = 'N' OR A.RWRD_YN IS NULL)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.CO_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.TOT_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y'
AND A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
GROUP BY G.HGRK_DEPT_CDNM,G.HGRK_DEPT_CD, G.DEPT_CD,G.DEPT_CDNM
UNION ALL

,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CH' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CH_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CI' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CI_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CI_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CJ' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CJ_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CJ' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CJ_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CK' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CK_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CK' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CK_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CL' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CL_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CL_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CM' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CM_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CM' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CM_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CN' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CN_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CN_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CR' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CR_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CR_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CT' THEN NVL(A.TOT_CPS_AMT,0) ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CT_DT ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.DSFT_TYP_CD = 'CK' AND A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CT' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CT_CNT A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD='CY' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CK_CY_CNT
FROM TBL_DSFT_ACPN_PROC A LEFT JOIN TBL_HC_HIST C ON A.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO = C.DSFT_ACPN_SEQ_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CRPN_CUST_BASE D ON A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_USR B ON A.DSPSR_ID = B.USR_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_EMP_CD F ON A.DSPSR_ID = F.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_HR_DEPT_CD G ON F.BLNG_DEPT_CD = G.DEPT_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_SAP_CD H ON (A.ORGN_ENTR_DV_CD = H.CD_ID AND H.CD_CLAS_CD = '1') LEFT JOIN TBL_DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD I ON A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = I.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD
WHERE (G.HGRK_DEPT_CD IS NULL OR G.HGRK_DEPT_CD NOT IN ('E00054','E00056','T21000','E00053','E00042','E00044','JD1000','E00048')) AND A.PROC_DTM IS NOT NULL AND (A.DEL_YN = 'N' OR A.DEL_YN IS NULL) AND A.DSFT_TYP_CD IN ('CA','CK')
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0000000000' and #time_key# || '0332000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0400000000' and #time_key# || '0632000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '0700000000' and #time_key# || '0932000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '1000000000' and #time_key# || '1232000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '00000000' and #time_key# || '32000000'
and A.ACPN_DTM between #time_key# || '000000' and #time_key# || '240000'
A.DSFT_TYP_CD = #dsft_typ_cd#
A.DSFT_TAXN_TYP_CD = #dsft_taxn_typ_cd#
A.ORGN_PTR_ST_CD = #orgn_ptr_st_cd#
A.CONN_CHNL_KIND_CD = #conn_chnl_kind_cd#
G.HGRK_DEPT_CD = #hgrk_dept_cd#
G.DEPT_CD = #dept_cd#
(B.USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #dspsr_id_nm# ||'%' OR F.EMP_NM LIKE '%'|| #dspsr_id_nm# ||'%')
AND A.HC_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.HC_YN = 'N' OR A.HC_YN IS NULL)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.ATTD_SFT_CD = #attd_sft_cd#)
(A.HC_YN = 'Y' AND C.RSLT_SFT_CD = #rslt_sft_cd#)
A.HC_UABL_RSN_CD = #hc_uabl_rsn_cd#
A.PRDCT_CD = #prdct_cd#
A.PRBLM_PENOM_CD = #prblm_penom_cd#
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_CUST IS NOT NULL
AND A.VHCL_QLIT_DSFT_CAUS_CD_PTR_ST IS NOT NULL
A.VHCL_BIZTR_QLIT_DSFT_TYP_CD = #vhcl_biztr_qlit_dsft_typ_cd#
AND A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN = 'N' OR A.VHCL_BIZTR_YN IS NULL)
AND A.RWRD_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.RWRD_YN = 'N' OR A.RWRD_YN IS NULL)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.PTR_ST_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.CO_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.CO_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.CO_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 10000
AND (A.TOT_CPS_AMT >= 10000 AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT < 100000)
AND A.TOT_CPS_AMT > 100000
AND A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_CNSLR = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
AND A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y'
AND A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y'
AND (A.DSPSR_YN_DSFT_CHRG = 'Y' OR A.DSPSR_YN_PART_HD = 'Y')
) Q2
ON Q1.DEPT_CD = Q2.DEPT_CD
GROUP BY ROLLUP(Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CD,Q1.DEPT_CD) ORDER BY Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CD, MAX(Q1.DEPT_CDNM), Q1.HGRK_DEPT_CD,Q1.DEPT_CD
